00015 namespace reflection

00020         struct array_type::array_type_impl : public type::type_impl
00021         {
00022                 array_type_impl(type* elem_type, size_t length)
00023                         : type_impl(T_ARRAY, ARCH_ARRAY, elem_type ? elem_type->size() * length : 0)
00024                         , m_elem_t(elem_type)
00025                         , m_length(length)
00026                 { }
00027 
00028                 virtual void print_name() const
00029                 {
00030                         stack_string<> buf = m_elem_t->name();
00031                         *buf += " [";
00032                         char ib[64];
00033                         sprintf(ib, "%d", m_length);
00034                         *buf += ib;
00035                         *buf += ']';
00036                         set_name(buf->c_str());
00037                 }
00038 
00039                 type* m_elem_t;
00040                 size_t m_length;
00041         };
00042 
00044 
00045         array_type::array_type(type* elem_type, size_t length)
00046                 : type(new array_type_impl(elem_type, length))
00047         {
00048                 m_impl = static_cast<array_type_impl*>(type::m_impl);
00049         }
00050 
00052 
00053         type* array_type::element_type() const
00054         {
00055                 return m_impl->m_elem_t;
00056         }
00057 
00059 
00060         size_t array_type::length() const
00061         {
00062                 return m_impl->m_length;
00063         }
00064 
00066 
00067         bool array_type::equal(const type* other) const
00068         {
00069                 if(!type::equal(other)) 
00070                         return false;
00071                 const array_type* at = static_cast<const array_type*>(other);
00072                 return m_impl->m_elem_t->equal(at->m_impl->m_elem_t)
00073                         && m_impl->m_length == at->m_impl->m_length;
00074         }
